channel.title: Beginner, guidance please :)
channel.description:
Hey well ive been playing private servers for a long time and feel i'm ready to learn from the start what you need to start a server up. Was just looking for a bit of guidance really, my knowledge of computers is fine i no my way around them.
If anyone could offer knowledge or links to places which would help me would be very grateful.
And if this is in the wrong place very sorry x Gib

item.title: Beginner, guidance please :)
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

Download any Deltascape source. They’re basic.

Read full topic

item.title: Beginner, guidance please :)
item.dc:creator: @Crystal_Meth Crystal Meth
item.description:
@Crystal_Meth wrote:

[quote=“mrpyro3, post:3, topic:408926”][quote author=xXxSkillerxXx link=topic=510208.msg3703110#msg3703110 date=1312861908]
Wrong Section, But what are you wanting to know, how to host, how to create a webclient, how to portforward. no-ip or what?
[/quote]
How is this the wrong section? He’s asking for links that might help him in the long run.
At OP, the site you are on now is a fine site to get started. Just head over to the Server downloads, get you a source and client, then go to the server tutorials section.[/quote]
Thank you my friend, just anything that will help cheers

BTW you said download a client and a source, is there any you can say is good for beginners?

Read full topic

item.title: Beginner, guidance please :)
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

xXxSkillerxXx:

Wrong Section, But what are you wanting to know, how to host, how to create a webclient, how to portforward. no-ip or what?

How is this the wrong section? He’s asking for links that might help him in the long run.
At OP, the site you are on now is a fine site to get started. Just head over to the Server downloads, get you a source and client, then go to the server tutorials section.

Read full topic
